item.title: Farewell, Joe LeGrand
item.description: Once upon a time I didn’t like Joe LeGrand. It was 3rd grade. I was in the Epiphany Toppers Drum and Bugle Corps, and Joe was a bugler who stood right in front of me. He kept turning around and giving me dirty looks. So I decided right then and there that I didn’t like him. Joe was a year ahead of me in school. While our lives intersected a lot, we weren’t really close.
